item.title: The "why" and the "what" for writing good comments
item.description: We often talk about avoiding unecessary comments that needlessly paraphrase what the code does. In this article, I gathered some thoughts about why writing comments is as important as writing the code itself, and how to spot comments that should be refactored using the 'what' and the 'why'.
